item.title: Quick prayers for ye olde delta source :p
item.dc:creator: @dutchboy dutchboy
item.description:
@dutchboy wrote:

[quote=“relexlawl, post:13, topic:432567”][quote author=dutchboy link=topic=535279.msg3913851#msg3913851 date=1328998423]

server sided checking is required, for example
When checking prayers which can’t go together.
[/quote]that is probably the only thing that is needed server sided. (besides the actionid on/off functions

The only thing needed client sided is the interface, the rest is supposed to be handled server sided…

Well fine then.
But this way is better than completely client sided because it’l give you more control over the buttons.

Lol, I was replying to loveandpower not you o.O[/quote]
Oh ups quoted the wrong person sowwy

Read full topic

either way good job converting. I am sure somebody can use this!

item.title: Quick prayers for ye olde delta source :p
item.dc:creator: @dutchboy dutchboy
item.description:
@dutchboy wrote:

I am owner blade on other forums

I converted the quick prayers released to my source
Also added checking my own weird way.

Client part:

Interface(class9)

	public static void addQuickPrayerClick(int id, int sid, String spriteName, String tooltip, int width, int height) {
		Class9 tab = aClass9Array210[id] = new Class9();
		tab.anInt250 = id;
		tab.anInt236 = id;
		tab.anInt262 = 5;
		tab.anInt217 = 1;
		tab.anInt214 = 0;
		tab.opacity = 0;
		tab.anInt230 = 52;
		tab.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_207 = LoadSpritei(sid, spriteName);
		tab.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_260 = LoadSpritei(sid + 1, spriteName);
		tab.anInt220 = width;
		tab.anInt267 = height;
		tab.aString221 = tooltip;
	}

	public int prayChecked = 0;

	public static void quickCurses(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4[] TDA) {
		int frame = 0;
		Class9 tab = addDTab(38380);
   		addSpritei(38341, 0, "Summon/quickpray");
		addText(38382, "Select your quick curses:", 16750623, false, true, 12, TDA, 2);
    		addSpriteWithOpacity1(38374, 1, "Summon/quickpray", 50);
    		for (int k = 38342; k <= 38362; k++) {
      			addQuickPrayerClick(k, 2, "Summon/quickpray", "Select", 14, 15);
    		}
		setChildren(46, tab);
		setBounds(22504, 5, 8+17, frame++, tab);
		setBounds(22506, 44, 8+20, frame++, tab);
		setBounds(22508, 79, 11+19, frame++, tab);
		setBounds(22510, 116, 10+18, frame++, tab);
		setBounds(22512, 153, 9+20, frame++, tab);
		setBounds(22514, 5, 48+18, frame++, tab);
		setBounds(22516, 44, 47+21, frame++, tab);
		setBounds(22518, 79, 49+20, frame++, tab);	
		setBounds(22520, 116, 50+19, frame++, tab);
		setBounds(22522, 154, 50+20, frame++, tab);		
		setBounds(22524, 4, 84+21, frame++, tab);		
		setBounds(22526, 44, 87+19, frame++, tab);		
		setBounds(22528, 81, 85+20, frame++, tab);	
		setBounds(22530, 117, 85+20, frame++, tab);					
		setBounds(22532, 156, 87+18, frame++, tab);			
		setBounds(22534, 5, 125+19, frame++, tab);			
		setBounds(22536, 43, 124+19, frame++, tab);		
		setBounds(22538, 83, 124+20, frame++, tab);										
		setBounds(22540, 115, 125+21, frame++, tab);
		setBounds(22442, 154, 126+22, frame++, tab);
		setBounds(38341, 0, 22, frame++, tab);
    		setBounds(38341, 0, 237, frame++, tab);
    		setBounds(38374, 0, 25, frame++, tab);
    		setBounds(38342, 2, 25, frame++, tab);
    		setBounds(38343, 41, 25, frame++, tab);
    		setBounds(38344, 76, 25, frame++, tab);
    		setBounds(38345, 113, 25, frame++, tab);
    		setBounds(38346, 150, 25, frame++, tab);
    		setBounds(38347, 2, 65, frame++, tab);
    		setBounds(38348, 41, 65, frame++, tab);
    		setBounds(38349, 76, 65, frame++, tab);
    		setBounds(38350, 113, 65, frame++, tab);
    		setBounds(38351, 150, 65, frame++, tab);
    		setBounds(38352, 2, 102, frame++, tab);
    		setBounds(38353, 41, 102, frame++, tab);
    		setBounds(38354, 76, 102, frame++, tab);
    		setBounds(38355, 113, 102, frame++, tab);
    		setBounds(38356, 150, 102, frame++, tab);
    		setBounds(38357, 2, 141, frame++, tab);
    		setBounds(38358, 41, 141, frame++, tab);
    		setBounds(38359, 76, 141, frame++, tab);
    		setBounds(38360, 113, 141, frame++, tab);
    		setBounds(38361, 150, 141, frame++, tab);
    		setBounds(38382, 5, 5, frame++, tab);
    		setBounds(38372, 0, 237, frame++, tab);
    		setBounds(38373, 0, 237, frame++, tab);
	}

	public static void quickPrayers(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4[] TDA) {
   		int i = 0;
    		Class9 localRSInterface = addDTab(38340);
    		addSpritei(38341, 0, "Summon/quickpray");
    		addText(38371, "Select your quick prayers:", TDA, 0, 16750623, false, true);
    		addSpriteWithOpacity1(38374, 1, "Summon/quickpray", 50);
    		for (int k = 38342; k <= 38367; k++) {
      			addQuickPrayerClick(k, 2, "Summon/quickpray", "Select", 14, 15);
    		}

        	addHoveri(38372, 1, 0, 38373, 4, "Summon/quickpray",190, 24, "Confirm Selection");
        	addHoveredi(38373, 5, "Summon/quickpray", 190, 24, 38375);

    		setChildren(58, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(25001, 5, 28, i++, localRSInterface);
   		setBounds(25003, 44, 28, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(25005, 79, 31, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(25007, 116, 30, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(25009, 153, 29, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(25011, 5, 68, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(25013, 44, 67, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(25015, 79, 69, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(25017, 116, 70, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(25019, 154, 70, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(25021, 4, 104, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(25023, 44, 107, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(25025, 81, 105, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(25027, 117, 105, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(25029, 156, 107, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(25031, 5, 145, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(25033, 43, 144, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(25035, 83, 144, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(25037, 115, 141, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(25039, 154, 144, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(25041, 5, 180, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(25043, 41, 178, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(25045, 79, 183, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(25047, 116, 178, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(25049, 161, 180, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(25051, 5, 219, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(38341, 0, 22, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(38341, 0, 237, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(38374, 0, 25, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(38342, 2, 25, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(38343, 41, 25, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(38344, 76, 25, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(38345, 113, 25, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(38346, 150, 25, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(38347, 2, 65, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(38348, 41, 65, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(38349, 76, 65, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(38350, 113, 65, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(38351, 150, 65, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(38352, 2, 102, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(38353, 41, 102, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(38354, 76, 102, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(38355, 113, 102, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(38356, 150, 102, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(38357, 2, 141, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(38358, 41, 141, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(38359, 76, 141, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(38360, 113, 141, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(38361, 150, 141, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(38362, 2, 177, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(38363, 41, 177, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(38364, 76, 177, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(38365, 113, 177, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(38366, 150, 177, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(38367, 2, 211, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(38371, 5, 5, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(38372, 0, 237, i++, localRSInterface);
    		setBounds(38373, 0, 237, i++, localRSInterface);
    	}

This is also without the weird tail thingy

If udnt have a opacity drawing method

	public int opacity1 = 0;
    public static void addSpriteWithOpacity1(int i, int j, String s, int opacity)
    {
        Class9 class9 = aClass9Array210[i] = new Class9();
        class9.anInt250 = i;
        class9.anInt236 = i;
        class9.anInt262 = 10;
        class9.anInt217 = 0;
        class9.anInt214 = 0;
        class9.opacity1 = opacity;
        class9.anInt230 = 52;
        class9.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_207 = LoadSpritei(j, s);
        class9.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_260 = LoadSpritei(j, s);
        class9.anInt220 = 512;
        class9.anInt267 = 334;
    }

Next in your client.java

Checking support:
Search for

if(class9_1.anInt262 == 5)

then abit below change this:

if(method131(class9_1, false))

to this:

if(method131(class9_1, false) || class9_1.prayChecked == 1)

Now look for:

and replace this:

                	class9_5.anInt263 = k2;
                	class9_5.anInt265 = l10;

with this:

		if(l10 == 600) {
			if(k2 == 1) {
				class9_5.prayChecked = 1;
			} else {
				class9_5.prayChecked = 0;
			}
		} else {
                	class9_5.anInt263 = k2;
                	class9_5.anInt265 = l10;
		}

Ok you now got the checking support.

Transparent sprite support:
look for this:

                    Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3.anInt1467 = j4;
                }

under it add this:

		if(class9_1.anInt262 == 10) {
			Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1 localSprite1;
			if (method131(class9_1, false))
				localSprite1 = class9_1.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_260;
			else {
				localSprite1 = class9_1.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_207;
			}
                	if (localSprite1 != null)
				if(class9_1.opacity1 != 0)
					localSprite1.method350(k2, l2, class9_1.opacity1, true);
				else
					localSprite1.method350(k2, l2, class9_1.opacity1, true);
		}

Ok client sided part done

SERVER SIDED PART:
In client.java:

	public QuickPrayer quickPrayer = new QuickPrayer(this);
	public QuickCurses quickCurses = new QuickCurses(this);

	public void setQuickPray(int id1, int id2, int id3) {
		outStream.createFrame(70);
		outStream.writeWord(id1);
		outStream.writeWordBigEndian(id2);
		outStream.writeWordBigEndian(id3);
	}

add these to ur loadgame method:


                        		} else if (token.equals("quickPrayer")) {
                           			 quickPrayers2[Integer.parseInt(token2)] = true;
                        		} else if (token.equals("quickCurse")) {
                           			 quickCurses2[Integer.parseInt(token2)] = true;

and these to ur savegame method:

			for(int i1 = 0; i1 < quickPrayers2.length; i1++) {
				if(quickPrayers2[i1] == true) {
					String toWrite = "quickPrayer = "+i1+"";
					characterfile.write(toWrite, 0, toWrite.length());
					characterfile.newLine();
				}
			}
			for(int i1 = 0; i1 < quickCurses2.length; i1++) {
				if(quickCurses2[i1] == true) {
					String toWrite = "quickCurse = "+i1+"";
					characterfile.write(toWrite, 0, toWrite.length());
					characterfile.newLine();
				}
			}

Wherever u handle button clicks(clickingmost probs)

			case 149233:
				c.quickCurses.selectQuickInterface();
			break;
			case 149232:
				c.quickCurses.turnOnQuicks();
			break;
			case 149231:
				c.quickCurses.turnOffQuicks();
			break;
			case 149228:
				c.quickCurses.clickConfirm();
			break;

			case 149198:
			case 149199:
			case 149200:
			case 149201:
			case 149202:
			case 149203:
			case 149204:
			case 149205:
			case 149206:
			case 149207:
			case 149208:
			case 149209:
			case 149210:
			case 149211:
			case 149212:
			case 149213:
			case 149214:
			case 149215:
			case 149216:
			case 149217:
			case 149218:
			case 149219:
			case 149220:
			case 149221:
			case 149222:
			case 149223:
				if (c.curses == 0)
					c.quickPrayer.clickPray(c.actionButtonId);
				else
					c.quickCurses.clickCurse(c.actionButtonId);
			break;

Classes to add:
public class QuickCurses { private client c; public QuickCurses(client c) - Pastebin.com
public class QuickPrayer { private client c; public QuickPrayer(client c) - Pastebin.com

U probably still need to edit to make it match your vars for prayers on/off headicons etc.

Oh and delcare these in ur player.java

	public boolean quickPray, quickCurse;
	public boolean quickCurseActive;
	public boolean choseQuickPro = false;
	public boolean[] quickCurses2 = new boolean[QuickCurses.MAX_CURSES];
	public boolean[] quickPrayers2 = new boolean[QuickPrayer.MAX_PRAYERS];

Thats it

CREDITS:
Me for checking
Me for converting to delta
Me for fixing up the interface codes
Uhm… demons dead i think for the server sided base and interface base.

Read full topic
